title: Studies on the synergistic effect between corn straw and Canadian oil sands bitumen during the co-pyrolysis process
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29404-29412
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05567E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bing Wang, Cuiyu Zhao, Congxiu Guo
With the content of corn straw ranging from 0 to 40 wt%, the coke yield increased during the co-pyrolysis of corn straw and Canadian oil sands bitumen, while the yields of gas and oil showed a decreasing trend.
